definition: mojibake (nonsense characters displayed when software fails to render text according to its intended character encoding)
in confusion or disorder/in a confused state of mind/disorder/upheaval/riot/illicit sexual relations/to throw into disorder/to mix up/indiscriminate/random/arbitrary
weight/number/code/to pile/to stack/classifier for length or distance (yard), happenings etc

sentences.english: Web site to remove some anti-reprint articles garbled interference.
sentences.chinese: 去掉部分网站文章防转载的干扰乱码。

sentences.english: Kawashima with those codes to find Bai Dayi, he let him make analysis.
sentences.chinese: 川岛带着那些乱码去找白大怡，他让他做出分析。

sentences.english: Without the proper decryption, the content of the message would just be digital gibberish.
sentences.chinese: 没有正确的解密系统，邮件内容不过是些乱码罢了。

sentences.english: Web site to remove some anti - reprint articles garbled interference.
sentences.chinese: 去掉部分网站文章䂢防转载的干扰乱码。

sentences.english: The rubbing of the garbled Chinese characters of The Archaeology of Memory sets a good example.
sentences.chinese: 恰如《记忆考古》这件作品的中文乱码拓片。

sentences.english: What you saw is the code mess-up ?
sentences.chinese: 翻译3“你所看到的是乱码吗？”

(of a mobile app) to crash on startup/to crash
blank/blank space on a form/space/囗 (indicating missing or illegible character)
